spans.description: SELECT "Order->Customer"."name", "Order->Customer->Address"."city", "Order->Product->Supplier"."name" FROM "orders" AS "Order" LEFT JOIN "customers" AS "Order->Customer" ON "Order"."customerId" = "Order->Customer"."id" LEFT JOIN "addresses" AS "Order->Customer->Address" ON "Order->Customer"."addressId" = "Order->Customer->Address"."id" LEFT JOIN "products" AS "Order->Product" ON "Order"."productId" = "Order->Product"."id" LEFT JOIN "suppliers" AS "Order->Product->Supplier" ON "Order->Product"."supplierId" = "Order->Product->Supplier"."id" WHERE "Order->Customer->Address"."country" = "USA";

sentry_tags.description: SELECT "Order->Customer"."name", "Order->Customer->Address"."city", "Order->Product->Supplier"."name" FROM "orders" AS "Order" LEFT JOIN "customers" AS "Order->Customer" ON "Order"."customerId" = "Order->Customer"."id" LEFT JOIN "addresses" AS "Order->Customer->Address" ON "Order->Customer"."addressId" = "Order->Customer->Address"."id" LEFT JOIN "products" AS "Order->Product" ON "Order"."productId" = "Order->Product"."id" LEFT JOIN "suppliers" AS "Order->Product->Supplier" ON "Order->Product"."supplierId" = "Order->Product->Supplier"."id" WHERE "Order->Customer->Address"."country" = "USA";

data.db.name: injection_test
data.db.statement: SELECT "Order->Customer"."name", "Order->Customer->Address"."city", "Order->Product->Supplier"."name" FROM "orders" AS "Order" LEFT JOIN "customers" AS "Order->Customer" ON "Order"."customerId" = "Order->Customer"."id" LEFT JOIN "addresses" AS "Order->Customer->Address" ON "Order->Customer"."addressId" = "Order->Customer->Address"."id" LEFT JOIN "products" AS "Order->Product" ON "Order"."productId" = "Order->Product"."id" LEFT JOIN "suppliers" AS "Order->Product->Supplier" ON "Order->Product"."supplierId" = "Order->Product->Supplier"."id" WHERE "Order->Customer->Address"."country" = "USA";
